description: Presea Combatir is a lumberjack from the small town of Ozette, in Tethe`alla. She admires http://anidb.net/ch11679 [Colette] for being able to "smile and forgive" almost any wrongdoing. Furthermore, she is one of the few characters who tolerates http://anidb.net/ch11684 [Zelos]` flippant behaviour, and she seems to take everything quite literally.
name: Presea Combatir
